newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finland Bank tender rate unchanged at 3.00 pct.
newsitem.headline: Finland Bank tender rate unchanged at 3.00 pct.

text.p: The Bank of Finland on Friday drained 6.47 billion markka of spot liquidity in an auction of one-month paper at an unchanged 3.00 percent tender rate.
Before the opening, the central bank forecast a spot liquidity surplus of 12.80 billion markka. The required daily balance for banks was 6.48 billion markka.
The Bank of Finland's tender rate -- its chief monetary policy tool -- has been unchanged since it was lowered to 3.00 percent from 3.10 percent on October 9.
